read_chunk(folder, date)

Read all the data contained in the subfolder of the called folder

vlist(data[, rm_nan])

Extract the velocity components from a JHTD data format. Spatial coherence is lost (return a list of single data points) INPUT ----- data : JHTD data format OUTPUT ----- U : numpy array of 1d1c velocity components each element corresponds to one point 3C of velocity.
